verbs.description: North Korean dictator Kim Jong - un and President Donald Trump [V: were] treated to a six - course meal that included three deserts at their historic summit .

North Korean dictator Kim Jong - un and President Donald Trump were treated to [ARG2: a six - course meal] [R-ARG2: that] [V: included] [ARG1: three deserts at their historic summit] .
